content:
I'm happy to help you with your cord organization project! It can be frustrating when packages don't arrive on time. Hopefully, your cable organizers will arrive soon and help you tame the cord chaos.

As for your smart speaker, I'm glad I could help you with creating custom routines. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

In the meantime, I'll offer some additional tips for exploring your smart speaker's features:

1. **Explore the App**: Continue to explore the companion app for your smart speaker to discover new features, settings, and integrations.
2. **Check for Updates**: Regularly check for software updates to ensure you have the latest features and improvements.
3. **Discover New Skills**: Browse the "Skills" or "Actions" section in the app to find new features and integrations that can enhance your smart speaker experience.
4. **Experiment with Voice Commands**: Try out different voice commands to see what your smart speaker can do. You might discover new features or shortcuts!
5. **Integrate with Other Devices**: Connect your smart speaker with other devices in your home to unlock more features and functionality.

Remember, your smart speaker is a powerful tool that can simplify your life and make your home more convenient. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance.

Now, go ahead and stay organized with those cable organizers when they arrive!
